Key Match Events: The Suns had a 44-point explosion in the third quarter to subdue the Portland Trail Blazers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Suns are now 5-1 a week and a half into the season
Grayson Allen came alive, chipping in 18 points on an all-around efficient scoring performance
The Suns' sixth man came to play in his fourth game of the season
Others: The Suns have made a pattern of starting the game slow and finishing it in nearly indestructible fashion
The team's slow start could be correlated to issues presented by Jusuf Nurkic or Tyus Jones still trying to find his way in the grand scheme of an elite offense
